abilities.name: Verdant Wind
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any Grass Energy attached to it can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Emerald Slash
attacks.effect: You may search your deck for 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
